result.eng: And here comes the man himself.
result.ga: Agus seo chugainn an fear féin
result.orig: Agus seo chugainn an fear féin
result.html: Agus seo chugainn an fear féinAnd here comes the man himself.
result.ponchtml: Agus seo ċugainn an fear féinAnd here comes the man himself.

result.eng: The article comes with a glossary.
result.ga: Tá gluais ag gabháil leis an alt
result.orig: Tá gluais ag gabháil leis an alt
result.html: Tá gluais ag gabháil leis an altThe article comes with a glossary.
result.ponchtml: Tá gluais ag gaḃáil leis an altThe article comes with a glossary.

result.eng: I'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ga: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.orig: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.html: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ponchtml: Inseoiḋ mise do m'aṫair air é aċ é a ṫeaċt ón ḟarraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
